verses.verse: And Naomi<WH5281> had a kinsman<WH4129> of her husband<WH376>'s, a mighty<WH1368> man<WH376> of wealth<WH2428>, of the family<WH4940> of Elimelech<WH458>; and his name<WH8034> was Boaz<WH1162>.
